relation: Tuition is very reasonable, that is comparable to other community colleges in Washington. The book stores are a little expensive compared to online sites.
I am a distance learner online so I can't really address the fun in Spokane :-)
I can't say, as I am a distance learner and have not eaten at the school.
My classes are challenging but the teachers are more than willing to help with questions and to find tutoring when needed.
Make sure you register early and look all over the web site. Submitting your information accurately and on time is extremely helpful.
Spokane Falls has been able to meet my needs as an on-line student. They have worked willingly to accommodate all my specific questions and requirements.
pageTitle: Spokane Falls Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 06/09/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 47 Bradley from Grand Coulee, WA Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Apply early, register for classes as soon as you can, and try to get good teachers. Bang for the buck Way cheaper then four year colleges by far and you find the exact same classes you would get at a four year school. Totally worth spending your first few years of college here. Am enjoying being here I am not too involved with extra stuff going on at the school. There is a wide array of people here though, so your bound to find people you will get along with which will make your experience here more enjoyable. Am learning a lot There are some really good teachers here if you get the right one. If you go onto ratemyprofessor.com and look up the teachers it is really helpful in choosing a good one. Also, try to talk to the people around campus about which one's they like. I've learned a lot from some of the teachers here and barely anything from others, so try to get a good one! Login to rate or flag the reviews Thomas from
